description: After several hours playing through an exclusive, hands-on demo of Cairn, the upcoming climbing-survival sim, we were riveted. author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Now Stranger Things has come to an end, fans are wondering what’s next from the wider Stranger Things universe. Some have speculated that a sequel of sorts could be in the works, one that checks back in on the main characters maybe a decade after the events of the Season 5 finale. But the Duffer brothers, co-creators and showrunners of Stranger Things, have ruled a sequel out, saying making such a thing would come across as a “gross cash grab.”
title: The Duffer Brothers Rule Out Stranger Things Sequel That Checks in on the Characters Years Later, Say It Would Be ‘A Gross Cash Grab’
